content.raw:
Yeah, that's what I'm doing at the moment. Based on that application you can see where my desire for the static joints came up, because it would save a bunch of boilerplate text in the SDF file and reduce the computational complexity a bit, which is the motivation behind the feature request.

Essentially I'm using this simulator data as inputs to an algorithm I'm testing that runs real time on a separate system without gazebo so its basically an easy way to use gazebo as a simulator that meets my needs while minimizing the implementation necessary to get there.
